title: Understanding the Status Panel
content:
The Status Panel shows real-time information about your projector. It's located on the left side of the main window.

## What You'll See

### Projector Name
The friendly name you assigned during setup (e.g., "Conference Room A").

### Connection Status
- ðŸŸ¢ **Connected** - Communication is working normally
- ðŸ”´ **Disconnected** - Cannot reach the projector
- ðŸŸ¡ **Connecting** - Attempting to establish connection

### Power State
- **On** - Projector is powered on and ready
- **Off** - Projector is powered off
- **Warming Up** - Projector is turning on (30-60 seconds)
- **Cooling Down** - Projector is shutting down (60-90 seconds)

### Current Input Source
Shows which input is active:
- HDMI1, HDMI2 - Digital HDMI inputs
- VGA - Analog VGA input
- Component - Component video
- Network - Network display

### Last Update
Time since the last status refresh. Updates automatically every 5 seconds.

## What to Watch For

> **Tip:** If "Last Update" shows more than 10 seconds, there may be a connection issue.

> **Note:** The Status Panel only shows information - use the Control Buttons to make changes.
